charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) &; 924(a)(2) - POSSESSION OF FIREARMS, re rifles, by a convicted felon, who has four previous felony convictions. --- (18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT FIREARMS, ETC)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 51 Months Imprisonment; 3 Years Supervised Release with usual &; special conditions; $200 Special assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(3) &; 924(a)(2) - POSSESSION OF FIREARMS by an unlawful user of a controlled substance as defined in 21:802. --- (18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT FIREARMS, ETC)(3)

charges.charge_disposition: 51 Months Imprisonment; 3 Years Supervised Release with usual &; special conditions; $200 Special assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) &; 924(a)(2) - POSSESSION OF AMMUNITION, by a convicted felon, who has four previous felony convictions. --- (18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT FIREARMS, ETC)(2)
